about.summary: Results-driven and detail-oriented Cyber Security specialist with a strong academic background in network security, vulnerability assessment, and incident response.
about.specialization: I specialize in penetration testing, network analysis, and creating secure systems. My technical expertise includes Python programming, Linux environments, and various cybersecurity tools and frameworks.
about.portfolio_description: This portfolio site is designed to showcase my cybersecurity projects and experience, reflecting my commitment to protecting digital assets and identifying security threats.
about.journey: My journey in cybersecurity is driven by a passion for protecting digital assets and implementing robust security measures. I continuously seek opportunities to apply my skills in identifying and mitigating security vulnerabilities.

education.institution: Kalasalingam Academy of Research and Education

certifications.title: IT Security: Defense against the digital dark arts
